CustomField.formula:
IF( OR (AND(Markup__c > 0, Multiplier__c > 0),AND( ISNULL(Markup__c), ISNULL(Multiplier__c)), AND(Markup__c <= 0, Multiplier__c <= 0)) ,(Cost__c * Quantity__c),
IF( AND(Multiplier__c > 0, OR(Markup__c <= 0,ISNULL(Markup__c))),(Cost__c * Quantity__c) * Multiplier__c,
IF(AND(Markup__c > 0, OR(Multiplier__c <= 0,ISNULL(Multiplier__c))),(Cost__c * Quantity__c) + (Markup__c * (Cost__c * Quantity__c)),(Cost__c * Quantity__c) )))
CustomField.label: Sales Price
